forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, a radiant sun envelops the city, filtering through a light veil of warmth that teeters near 67 degrees. The skies are a soft blue, unmarred by fog, allowing stunning views of the iconic landscape. As the day settles into the early evening, a gentle westward breeze stirs, whispering at up to 14 miles per hour, reminding city dwellers of the high cliffs and crashing waves not far off. Tonight promises a languid charm, with cloud cover rolling in, dimming the brilliance of daylight as temperatures dip to a comfortable 56.

As you navigate through this picturesque setting, consider donning layers—a light jacket or a cozy sweater could be your perfect companion against the evening chill. The absence of fog enables an inviting atmosphere for strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a quaint café visit, where you can savor a warm drink while watching the city transition to its nighttime glow. Enjoying a leisurely walk through the streets infused with a hint of salt in the air offers an entrancing way to relish in the understated beauty that is San Francisco at dusk.
